quote: I am really excited to come back to Southern California for some fun â€“ I love it there and the riding and weather are too good. I am even more excited to celebrate my Green Jerseys with the Monuments of Cycling crew and all the people I will get to ride with during my Fondo.

Monuments of Cycling is known for its world-class event productions, providing unparalleled riding experiences to top pros and aspiring amateurs alike, but it is our unique course concoctions, in beautiful North County San Diego, that set us apart from the usual Fondos.

There are no rides in San Diego where our unique topography of punchy climbs is celebrated with a large collection of Sprint Sectors for riders to compete in across all age categories. There are flat rides along the coast. There are rides that just do big climbs all day.
Peter is way happier now. The past three years I didn't see him this happy doing road races. And now: he changed his career path and I can immediately see the positive changes in him!

At the start/finish village in the center of North City/San Marcos on both Saturday and Sunday, participants will be able to enjoy pre- and post-race festivities from 70 vendors and local beers with Sagan.

After the ride, the festivities will all take place at URGE, which is a huge facility with the Mason Ale Works Brewery inside of it. There's the bowling alley, an outdoor party area for the awards ceremony and dining opportunities throughout the site...
